content: ridges is a luxuriously long scarf created with simple repetitive stitches a sequence the paired increases and decreases create a wonderful bias fabric i chose a luxury baby alpaca/merino blend and tucked in to enjoy the journey finished measurements one size width 6 length 107 tip to tip materials amano warmi grey 6010 3 hanks us# 7 needle 24 circular us #9 for bind off gauge 5 sts/in and 6 row/in in pattern stitch on #7 *more details on this pattern stitch and much more inspiration can be found on page 328 in sequence knitting by cecelia campochiaro
